## AlLocatorMatrix.setLocations() method

Updates the locator matrix model with a set of service node descriptors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setLocations(nodes: AlLocationDescriptor[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nodes | <code>AlLocationDescriptor[]</code> | A list of service node descriptors. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
